text: The Nelum Pokuna Theatre (, nelum pokuna rangahala; often known as Nelum Pokuna; the National Performing Arts Theatre before Mahinda Rajapaksa named the theatre after himself) is a performing arts theatre in Colombo, Sri Lanka. The theatre opened on 15 December 2011. == Design and features == The total cost of the project is thought to be 3,080 million LKR. The People's Republic of China gave LKR 2430 million out of the total cost of the building. == References == Category:Theatres Category:Colombo Category:Sri Lankan culture Category:Buildings and structures in Asia
